content: Sourav Adhikari works as a consulting Data Scientist at Policy & Development Advisory Group. His interests and work include automation in data extracction and cleaning processes, web scraping of various data sources, analysis of large scale socio-economic-political and demographic datasets, GIS based visualizations & statistical modelling. His other interests include effective usage of data in decision-making and public-policy sphere, as well as democratisation of data using participatory methods.
